front.team_text: You pick players from the actual teams with the fixed budget and get points based on how they perform in the actual matches.
front.features_title: Take part in official Norsk Tipping tournaments
front.tournament_text: We will have tournaments that will run for groupstage, final rounds as well as daily tournaments.
front.team_manager_text: Fantasy is a rapid increasing gametype, where you are the manager of your own team.
